meanings.definition: A person or thing that explodes.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks were the exploders in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The bomb squad carefully handled the exploders found in the building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids thought the balloons were secret exploders waiting to surprise them.
meanings.sent4: His temper was like a box of exploders, ready to go off at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The volcano erupted, sending fiery exploders high into the air.

meanings.sent1: The military used powerful exploders to demolish the old bridge.
meanings.sent2: The terrorist planted hidden exploders around the city.
meanings.sent3: The prank gift turned out to be a confetti exploders, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The car crash sounded like a symphony of metal exploders colliding.
meanings.sent5: The action movie was filled with thrilling scenes of exploders going off in every direction.

meanings.sent1: She accidentally exploders the balloon by sitting on it.
meanings.sent2: The demolition expert carefully exploders the old building.
meanings.sent3: The chef's experiment in the kitchen ended up being a pasta sauce exploders all over the walls.
meanings.sent4: His anger finally exploders when he couldn't find his keys.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was set to exploders at midnight, lighting up the night sky.
